sentence: Governors ? GA-Gov: The Atlanta Journal-Constitution reports that former Sen. David Perdue's allies at Georgia Action Fund are spending at least $600,000 on a new commercial touting him and tearing down incumbent Brian Kemp ahead of their May Republican primary, which makes this the first major pro-Perdue outside buy.
